subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|き}} ''({{w|Hiragana}} character derived from {{w|Man'yōgana}})''
* {{l|ja|キ}} ''({{w|Katakana}} character derived from {{w|Man'yōgana}})''
* [[𛀤]]
* [[𛀥]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In standards of Hong Kong, Japan and Taiwan, the {{zh-l|*人}} component in the lower left of {{lang|zh|幾}} touches but does not cross the horizontal stroke in the {{zh-l|*戈}} component. In standard of Mainland China, the top of the {{lang|zh|人}} component crosses over the horizontal stroke in the {{lang|zh|戈}} component.
